title: Aniki no Shigoki!
description: It is assumed that when you enter high school is ?, Is the bride Popularity? .... Yuta Tanaka a normal high school student in search of a bride and popularity, despite being in search of it and they will do 2 years in a row since its inception in high school, followed by rejections and disappointments he begins to think that this is due to his name ... to which decides to such a nickname Nakayuu (Abbreviated name) and find an inspiration in it. ..in this process is a rather peculiar and popular student of the same year called Goriki Ittetsu, my first sight was surprised to find quite up to great and a great person to follow .... But what if one day the person you admire most find it,!? Having sex in school !!? And part?! With a Man !!?
